title: GTA Online
headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Get 40% Bonus GTA$ on Qualifying Shark Cards
content:
Sign in to the Rockstar Games account linked to your GTA Online character and opt in by December 7 to claim up to GTA$4,000,000 bonus cash when you purchase a Megalodon, Whale, or Great White Shark Card before January 7, 2026.

Must activate offer by December 7 at 11:59 p.m. ET and complete purchase of qualifying Shark Card by January 7 at 11:59 p.m. ET to receive bonus. The Shark Card Bonus Offer is limited to one redemption per each type of qualifying Shark Card.
